SNOWTIDE SKI AND SNOWBOARD SMART HELMET DESCRIPTION

A unique ski helmet with smart connectivity, Snowtide integrates class-leading
safety and features with immersive sound and advanced two-way communications.

Quickly connect to your smartphone via Bluetooth to answer calls or find the
perfect song for the perfect run. Download the Snowtide **iOS/Android app** to
unlock advanced features including **real-time stats** **like distance,
duration, vertical, speed, altitude and slope angle.**

Whether it’s trying to meet up in the lift line or knowing when it’s safe to
drop that backcountry booter, communication is key. The Snowtide’s **two-way
group “walkie-talkie”** feature with **one-button Push to Talk (PTT)** and
unlimited range* makes hand-held radios obsolete.

We all fall, and if you go down hard, the Snowtide’s advanced **S.O.S alert
system** can call for backup. **Built-in impact sensors** will sound the
helmet’s personal alarm letting you know it’s been activated. All good? Clear
it. But if you need help, after 60 seconds the Snowtide will automatically
send text and/or email alerts with your location to the emergency contact(s)
you’ve preset in the app.

And if you lose track of your Snowtide, a loss prevention system will sound an
alarm on both the app and the helmet if they are separated by 50 feet.

Just because we went above and beyond making the Snowtide smarter than the
average helmet doesn’t mean we forgot the basics. Sliding vents provide
breathability on warm days or when you’re bootpacking bonus lines. Riding in
the white room? Close them on-the-fly for insulation from the elements. Goggle
guides and a strap lock keep things tidy, and front induction channels ensure
you can navigate with fog-free clarity.

In-mold construction combines an EPS impact layer with a durable ABS outer
shell for multi-layer protection. A dial-fit system and adjustable, padded
chin strap tie things together. And it’s all wrapped into a sleek, aerodynamic
design that’s surprisingly light for all the tech we’ve packed in.

Whether you’re lapping the park to your own personal soundtrack, scoping
backcountry lines with your crew or taking a call on the lift, stay protected
and connected with the Snowtide.
